subject: AI & Agents
title: AI in Warfare
description: A short lesson to help you apply AI in Warfare.

hook.text: Autonomous drones can select and engage targets without a human pressing the trigger.

buildup.text: Military AI includes target recognition, drone swarms, cyber warfare, and logistics optimization.

discovery.text: Lethal Autonomous Weapons Systems (LAWS) can make kill decisions faster than humans can intervene.

twist.text: The UN has debated banning LAWS for years. Major military powers have blocked agreements.

climax.text: The race to deploy autonomous weapons is accelerating despite ethical objections.

punchline.text: The hardest ethical question: who decides who lives and dies?

quiz.question: What are LAWS in the context of military AI?
options: Lethal Autonomous Weapons Systems that can make kill decisions
